page.title: 15RAMADAN IN READING
page.content: I am Rukhsana Ali. My family comes from Pakistan. I have been to visit Pakistan. Now I am in Reading I feel much better at this time of year because at midnight we get up because it is Ramadan. At 2 o'clock in the night we have something to eat and we go back to bed. When we get up in the morning we do not have breakfast or dinner or tea. We are not allowed to even have sip of water or a crumb of cake. At night when we begin to have our dinner we must have one or two dates. Even if you don't have it at the begining you must have one at the end. It is fun fasting because everybody does it in our family.
